# Commit Message Instructions for Cycle Sniper

## Message Structure
type(scope): subject

[body]

[footer]

## Types
- feat: New feature
- fix: Bug fix
- docs: Documentation
- style: Formatting
- refactor: Code restructuring
- test: Adding tests
- chore: Maintenance

## Scopes
- cycle: Cycle detection logic
- signal: Signal generation
- ui: User interface
- risk: Risk management
- data: Data handling
- perf: Performance optimization

## Guidelines
- Use imperative mood
- Limit subject to 50 chars
- Wrap body at 72 chars
- Reference issues in footer

## Examples
feat(cycle): implement DCL detection algorithm
fix(signal): correct FRAMA calculation
docs(risk): update position sizing guidelines
